name: babel-core
notes: babel-core (v6.26.3) is the legacy Babel 6 compiler core - now replaced by @babel/core (Babel 7+). Like all Babel packages (@babel/core, webpack, esbuild, tsc), this is a build-time transpilation tool for transforming JavaScript code using Babel plugins/presets during development and build pipelines. Requires filesystem access and Node.js APIs for compilation. Designed for build processes, not runtime execution in Workers.
